alert.note: Alert for Wabash (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 05 at 4:55PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Wabash County through 530 PM EDT... At 454 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near North Manchester. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy downpours could cause road ponding and nuisance flooding in low lying areas. Locations impacted include... North Manchester. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
